alert.note: Alert for Little River; Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 04 at 8:15PM CDT until November 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Redwater, or 11 miles southwest of Wake Village, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Wake Village, Nash and Red Lick around 830 PM CDT. Texarkana around 835 PM CDT. Texarkana and Mandeville around 840 PM CDT. Ogden around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Domino, Leary, Homan, Pleasant Hill, Pine Prairie and Mount Pleasant. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
